resources.string: CREATE TABLE matches ( match_id NOT NULL INTEGER, match_player1 TEXT, match_player2 TEXT, match_winner NOT NULL INTEGER, match_p1 NOT NULL REAL, match_p2 NOT NULL REAL, PRIMARY KEY (match_id) ); CREATE TABLE sets ( set_match NOT NULL INTEGER, set_nr NOT NULL INTEGER, set_winner NOT NULL INTEGER, set_isTiebreak NOT NULL INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY (set_match, set_nr), FOREIGN KEY (set_match) REFERENCES matches (match_id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ); CREATE TABLE games ( game_match NOT NULL INTEGER, game_set NOT NULL INTEGER, game_nr NOT NULL INTEGER, game_winner NOT NULL INTEGER, game_isTiebreak NOT NULL INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY (game_match, game_set, game_nr), FOREIGN KEY (game_match, game_set) REFERENCES sets (set_match, set_nr) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION ); CREATE TABLE points ( point_match NOT NULL INTEGER, point_set NOT NULL INTEGER, point_game NOT NULL INTEGER, point_nr NOT NULL INTEGER, point_winner NOT NULL INTEGER, point_server NOT NULL INTEGER PRIMARY KEY (point_match, point_set, point_game, point_nr), FOREIGN KEY (point_match, point_set, point_game) REFERENCES games (game_match, game_set, game_nr) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION );
